SELECT cr.room_id AS roomId, cr.book_id AS bookId, cr.seller_id AS sellerId, cr.buyer_id AS buyerId, cr.created_at AS createdAt,
su.login_id AS sellerLoginId, bu.login_id AS buyerLoginId,
b.title AS bookTitle, b.status AS productStatus, b.price AS price,
( SELECT bi.image_url FROM book_image bi WHERE bi.book_id = cr.book_id AND bi.is_thumbnail = true LIMIT 1 ) AS imageUrl,
( SELECT cm.content FROM chat_message cm WHERE cm.room_id = cr.room_id ORDER BY cm.sent_at DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS lastMessage,
( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(cm.sent_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') FROM chat_message cm WHERE cm.room_id = cr.room_id ORDER BY cm.sent_at DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS lastTime
FROM chat_room cr JOIN book b ON cr.book_id = b.book_id JOIN users su ON cr.seller_id = su.user_id JOIN users bu ON cr.buyer_id = bu.user_id WHERE (cr.seller_id = #{userId} OR cr.buyer_id = #{userId}) AND cr.is_closed = FALSE ORDER BY cr.created_at DESC

SELECT cm.message_id AS messageId, cm.room_id AS roomId, cm.sender_id AS senderId, u.login_id AS senderLoginId, cm.content, cm.sent_at AS sentAt FROM chat_message cm JOIN users u ON cm.sender_id = u.user_id WHERE cm.room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY cm.sent_at ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message ( room_id, sender_id, content, sent_at ) VALUES ( #{roomId}, #{senderId}, #{content}, #{sentAt} )
